title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 374: Featuring Sam Gagner + Fairway Folz
description:
On Episode 374 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Sam Gagner and Fairway Folz. Sam joined (01:08:01) to discuss his career, playing with Whit in Edmonton, the young Red Wings core and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing Whit’s trip to Disney World, the Olympics and some recent NHL news. The guys then talk to infamous prankster and Whit’s best friend, Fairway Folz (02:45:50) to debate the legacy of Tuukka Rask. The guys wrap up the show talking RA’s top 5 wrestlers and the Saudi Golf League.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
